string-array.name: inspirationalquotes
string-array.item: When it is darkest, we can see the stars. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
Place your hand over your heart, can you feel it? That is called purpose. You’re alive for a reason so don’t ever give up. - Unknown
Never never never give up. - Winston Churchill
When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful. - Malala
The world is a better place with you in it. - Unknown
Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go
Your speed doesn’t matter. Forward is forward
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
Start by doing whats necessary; then do whats possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome. -Booker T. Washington
Turn your wounds into wisdom -Oprah Winfrey
I cant change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination. -Jimmy Dean
I hated every minute of training, but I said, Dont quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion. -Muhammad Ali
Your big opportunity may be right where you are now

string-array.name: activities_list
string-array.item: Imagining you are walking through a meadow
Discover the therapeutic value of working in the garden
Volunteer for a good cause
Use a tension-relief roller
Decrease your workload
Call and talk to a friend
Get polarity therapy
Do a random act of kindness
Relish a favorite memory
Step outside and savor the sunlight
Take a nap
Do progressive muscle relaxation, starting with the feet and moving toward the head
Stretch for a few minutes
List all the things you love about yourself
Forgive yourself for the things you \"think\" you\'ve done wrong -- move on
Put on your favorite outfit
Spend time with family over a good meal
Create handmade thank you notes
Drink a cup of relaxation-inducing herbal tea, such as chamomile
Look back through pictures of happy memories -- family vacations and special events -- and focus on how happy you were
